A smart suitcase with AI-powered features: A suitcase with built-in sensors and AI technology that can detect and alert you of any unauthorized access, movement, or changes in temperature. It can also help you navigate through airports with real-time directions and provide personalized recommendations for food, shopping, and entertainment based on your preferences.

A modular and collapsible suitcase: A suitcase that can be easily disassembled and reassembled, allowing you to customize its size and shape depending on your travel needs. It can also be made of a lightweight and durable material, making it easy to carry and store.

A suitcase with a built-in projector: A suitcase with a built-in projector that can display a virtual map, weather forecast, or other information on any surface. It can also be used to watch movies or play games on the go.

A suitcase with a built-in water purification system: A suitcase with a built-in water purification system that can filter and purify water from any source, making it safe to drink. This can be especially useful for travelers who may be traveling to areas with questionable water quality.

A suitcase with a built-in air purification system: A suitcase with a built-in air purification system that can remove pollutants and allergens from the air, providing a clean and healthy environment for travelers. This can be especially useful for travelers who may be sensitive to air pollution or allergies.
